name: Super Multitasking
description: Super Multitasking is an evil experiment that challenges you to play up to 4 continuously-shuffling minigames at the same time. How long can you last against this onslaught? All of the gaming skills you've built up over the years will be tested!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo P8600, equivalent, or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 200 series, AMD Radeon HD 5000 series, Intel HD Graphics 4000, equivalent, or better Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360, DualShock4, Switch Pro, and Steam Controller supported
